metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11780 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A potential Remote Code Execution bug exists with the PDFInfo plugin inApache SpamAssassin before 3.4.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11780` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sa-compile - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
spamassassin - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
spamc - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spamassassin package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
